name: Drink and Tell - Drinking Game
description:
Are you sick of playing Never Have I Ever or Kings Cup at pre-drinks or at a party?

Introducing Drink and Tell, the ultimate and fun drinking game to play with a Tinder date or lots of friends at a party. Forget complicated rules and the same old classic games (Spin the Bottle, Never Have I Ever, Beer Pong, Truth or Dare, King’s Cup etc), Drink and Tell is fun for everyone!
With over 500,000 downloads in the Apple store, find out what all the fuss is about!

How to play:
Select from our 6 categories or randomise them. Take turns answering taboo questions from multiple choice answers. Once everyone has guessed what they think you would pick, swipe to reveal the answer. The friends who guessed wrong, have to drink!

Features:
- Play with one friend, or one hundred at the same time
- Play on just the one phone
- Diverse and taboo questions to trigger conversation
- Draw a new question by simple, swipe functionality

Play one of the many exciting categories or randomise them!

Categories include:
- Love
- Sex
- Ethics
- Personality
- Life and Death
- User Generated

Update: NEW fun categories added to purchase:
- Embarrassing
- Pop Culture
- Would You Rather
- Adults Only
- Relationships
- Outrageous
- Politics
- Mixed


Uncover all your friends deepest, darkest secrets, all while you drink!
